inclusion.criterion: 2 consecutive spermograms (with ±3 months interval) confirming absence of sperm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of non-obstructive azoospermia on the basis of a complete history, physical examination, endocrine profile, ultrasound and chromosomal analysis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of previous testicular surgery, except orchiopexy for undescended testis.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male with empty scrotum at the right side, diagnosed with abdominal undescended testis.
